item.title: CVE-2024-49239|2024-10-18T09:46:04.609Z -- nikhil%20vaghela -- add%20categories%20post%20footer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nikhil Vaghela Add Categories Post Footer allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Add Categories Post Footer: from n/a through 2.2.2.
